##### SHODAN and cookies

Upon your first visit to SHODAN, SHODAN sends a "cookie" to your computer.

SHODAN uses
cookies to improve the quality of our service and to understand our user base
more.

SHODAN does this by storing user preferences in cookies and by tracking
user trends and patterns of how people search.

SHODAN does not collect any unique information about you (such as your name,
email address, etc.)

SHODAN notes and saves information such as time of day, browser
type, browser language, and IP address with each query.

For
example, SHODAN may use your IP address or browser language to determine which
language to use when showing search results or advertisements.

When
SHODAN uses a URL redirecter, if you click on a URL from a search result,
information about the click is sent to SHODAN, and SHODAN in turn sends you to
the site you clicked on.

##### Your consent and changes to the Privacy Policy

By using the SHODAN Search Services and our web site, you consent to the
collection and use of your information as we have outlined in this policy and
to our Terms of Service Policy.

When we do, we will post those changes on this page
so that you are always aware of the information we collect, how we use it, and
under what circumstances we disclose it.

##### With whom does SHODAN share information?

SHODAN may share information about you with advertisers, business partners,
sponsors, and other third parties.

However, we only divulge aggregate
information about our users and will not share personally identifiable
information with any third party without your express consent.

For example, we
may disclose how frequently the average SHODAN user visits SHODAN.

Please be
aware, however, that we will release specific personal information about you
if required to do so in order to comply with any valid legal process such as a
search warrant, subpoena, statute, or court order.

When we do, we will post those changes on this page
so that you are always aware of the information we collect, how we use it, and
under what circumstances we disclose it.
